roleset.name: to make false and malicious statements
roleset.note: CALUMNIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'calumniate' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 33. (from calumniate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: basic
example.text: Tales and all the anecdotes of the Coffeehouses of Paris and of the dissenting meeting houses of London are scoured of all the slander of those who calumniate persons, that afterwards they may murder them with impunity
example.arg: that afterwards they may murder them with impunity
